actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from income tax a certain portion of the pay received by members of the Armed Forces who have served at least four years.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from income tax a specified portion of the pay received by members of the Armed Forces who have served at least four years on active duty.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from income tax a certain portion of the pay received by members of the Armed Forces who have served at least four years.
